author: missirol
body:
#### PR description:

As reported by HLT-JME contacts in a recent TSG meeting, the plugin `HLTPFJetsMatchedToFilteredJetsProducer` can produce duplicates in its output product.

This was already the case in the previous version of this plugin, i.e. [`PFJetsMatchedToFilteredCaloJetsProducer`](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/blob/CMSSW_12_2_X/HLTrigger/JetMET/src/PFJetsMatchedToFilteredCaloJetsProducer.cc), and it was intentionally not changed in #37057 (which was merely a technical migration, for renaming purposes).

I think `12_6_X` would be a good time to fix this. Since there is no physics validation done yet, I'm not sure this change should be backported to `12_4_X` and `12_5_X` (since there are dozens of instances of `HLTPFJetsMatchedToFilteredJetsProducer` running at HLT).

_Edit_ : changes are expected (see https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/39179#issuecomment-1241663125).

 - This PR removes duplicates in certain collections of HLT jets.
 - DQM modules that use the HLT jets passing certain jet triggers thus will have generally less entries (less jets), or jet-multiplicity distributions shifted to lower values.
 - In principle, even trigger results could change (1 jet duplicated N times would lead to passing a N-jet trigger before this PR, but not after the PR).
 - Differences might be more visible for lower-pT triggers, while at higher-pT I would expect less duplicates (and also we will have less stats to judge).

#### PR validation:

Next to none.

#### If this PR is a backport, please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported, please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

N/A
title: don't produce duplicate outputs in `HLTPFJetsMatchedToFilteredJetsProducer`
